title: Draft Mode Normals?
body: Would really like a draft mode normal queue.

replies.body: Draft mode normal's is very useful to practice for Ranked draft. But we don't have enough people to fill the queues is my guess.
We replace TB with it cause more people will play norms draft then TB
You cant 'just play ranked' because if your still learning and get terrible MMR taked forever to improve to a level you are at

I agree, but the point of TB is to remove champ select toxicity. 
If more people played it, more people will play, therefore more people will play and its system finally becomes useful.
Because people don't play it, people don't play, therefore people don't play it. 
To be honest, they should just remove Blind Pick because it's a useless mode. Having TB would just be more beneficial as the staple game mode than crappy Blind Pick.
If you want a quick match, join customs.
Can someone tell me if this guy is srs
I'm srs all I get every game is people saying it's just norms as if it's a valid justification to feed and troll. Tots not cool...
Remove Team Builder as mentioned and put Draft Normals.  It will sort out those in normal who want to get better for ranked and those who want to screw around better.
